title: BONUS EPISODE: Tink & Hitmaka On Stepping Away, Mental Health, Songwriting + 'Pillow Talk'
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Singer & Songwriter Tink and producer Hitmaka sat down with Ebro in the Morning for a great conversation surrounding the topic of mental health, the singer's decision to step away and reset from the music business, the difference between being an artist and a songwriter and much more. 

'Pillow Talk' is set to be released Friday, August 19. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
